quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.
author: Paul Prudhomme

quote: It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Instead of going out to dinner, buy good food. Cooking at home shows such affection. In a bad economy, it's more important to make yourself feel good.
author: Ina Garten

quote: Food for the body is not enough. There must be food for the soul.
author: Dorothy Day

quote: Part of the secret of a success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Food, in the end, in our own tradition, is something holy. It's not about nutrients and calories. It's about sharing. It's about honesty. It's about identity.
author: Louise Fresco

quote: Eating is so intimate. It's very sensual. When you invite someone to sit at your table and you want to cook for them, you're inviting a person into your life.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Food is our common ground, a universal experience.
author: James Beard

quote: Eating is not merely a material pleasure. Eating well gives a spectacular joy to life and contributes immensely to goodwill and happy companionship. It is of great importance to the morale.
author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quote: Food is your body's fuel. Without fuel, your body wants to shut down.
author: Ken Hill

quote: One should eat to live, not live to eat.
author: Moliere

quote: I like food. I like eating. And I don't want to deprive myself of good food.
author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quote: So long as you have food in your mouth, you have solved all questions for the time being.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: If you really want to make a friend, go to someone's house and eat with him... the people who give you their food give you their heart.
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: Only the pure in heart can make a good soup.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you who you are.
author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quote: Most of us have fond memories of food from our childhood. Whether it was our mom's homemade lasagna or a memorable chocolate birthday cake, food has a way of transporting us back to the past.
author: Homaro Cantu

quote: He was a bold man that first ate an oyster.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: The only think I like better than talking about Food is eating.
author: John Walters

quote: You can tell alot about a fellow's character by his way of eating jellybeans.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: A crust eaten in peace is better than a banquet partaken in anxiety.
author: Aesop

quote: Wine is bottled poetry.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: What I've enjoyed most, though, is meeting people who have a real interest in food and sharing ideas with them. Good food is a global thing and I find that there is always something new and amazing to learn - I love it!
author: Jamie Oliver

quote: I could talk food all day. I love good food.
author: Tom Brady

quote: When a man's stomach is full it makes no difference whether he is rich or poor.
author: Euripides

quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
author: Doug Larson

quote: A waffle is like a pancake with a syrup trap.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: My weaknesses have always been food and men - in that order.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: If God did not intend for us to eat animals, then why did he make them out of meat?
author: John Cleese

quote: Anything is good if it's made of chocolate.
author: Jo Brand

quote: There's no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap.
author: Kevin James

quote: When I eat with my friends, it is a moment of real pleasure, when I really enjoy my life.
author: Monica Bellucci

quote: Food should be fun.
author: Thomas Keller

quote: Baking cookies is comforting, and cookies are the sweetest little bit of comfort food. They are very bite-sized and personal.
author: Sandra Lee

quote: I am not a vegetarian because I love animals; I am a vegetarian because I hate plants.
author: A. Whitney Brown

quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Spaghetti can be eaten most successfully if you inhale it like a vacuum cleaner.
author: Sophia Loren

quote: Not eating meat is a decision, eating meat is an instinct.
author: Denis Leary

quote: The food that enters the mind must be watched as closely as the food that enters the body.
author: Pat Buchanan

quote: Every meal should end with something sweet. Maybe it's jelly on toast at breakfast, or a small piece of chocolate at dinner - but it always helps my brain bring a close to the meal.
author: Robert Irvine

quote: It's difficult to think anything but pleasant thoughts while eating a homegrown tomato.
author: Lewis Grizzard

quote: The kitchen is a sacred space.
author: Marc Forgione

quote: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: A man can live and be healthy without killing animals for food; therefore, if he eats meat, he participates in taking animal life merely for the sake of his appetite.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: A woman should never be seen eating or drinking, unless it be lobster salad and Champagne, the only true feminine and becoming viands.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Sharing food with another human being is an intimate act that should not be indulged in lightly.
author: M. F. K. Fisher

quote: My favorite time of day is to get up and eat leftovers from dinner, especially spicy food.
author: David Byrne

quote: You can't make a souffle rise twice.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: I like to say, 'Chop suey's the biggest culinary joke that one culture has ever played on another,' because chop suey, if you translate into Chinese, means 'tsap sui,' which, if you translate back, means 'odds and ends.'
author: Jennifer Lee

quote: My favorite animal is steak.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: I like to use 'I Can't Believe it's Not Butter' on my toast in the morning, because sometimes when I eat breakfast, I like to be incredulous. How was breakfast? Unbelievable.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: If you want to eat well in England, eat three breakfasts.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: I was 32 when I started cooking; up until then, I just ate.
author: Julia Child

quote: We may find in the long run that tinned food is a deadlier weapon than the machine-gun.
author: George Orwell

quote: More die in the United States of too much food than of too little.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith
